biography: Olli is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Hirsala Golf.  He has become a familiar face at the prestigious Hector Trophée, having competed in the event every year since 2022.

Olli’s consistent presence at the Hector Trophée speaks volumes about his skill and dedication to the game.  He’s demonstrated remarkable improvement over the years, culminating in a truly memorable victory in the 2024 tournament where he clinched the Victor trophy for best individual performance.

While Olli’s individual triumph in 2024 was a highlight, his overall record at the Hector Trophée is nothing short of impressive.  His consistent performance has led to multiple top finishes, solidifying his reputation as one of the most talented players in the tournament.

Olli’s victory in the 2023 Hector Trophée, alongside his partner, marked a significant achievement in his already stellar career. It cemented his place among the elite players, showcasing his ability to excel both individually and as part of a team. We look forward to seeing what Olli achieves in the upcoming Hector Trophée!
